title: Is it possible to make a camera of 576 megapixel? - Quora

response.answer_text: As for whether the human vision can be analogous to digital imagery, I recommend you to watch this video-  And coming to your question, Canon had showcased a 250 megapixel sensor at the CES 2017. Primarily aimed for industrial use cases ,probably for wide area surveillance.And with the rapid growth of science and technology, it’s not a question of whether something can be done, it’s just about when it will be done!

I am not sure about the camera having a high resolution of 576MP which is nearly equivalent to the resolution of human eye. But yes the recent advancement's in science & technology may lead to construction of such high resolution cameras.
